categories.label: New
categories.description: Featuring mouthwatering combinations with a choice of five different salads, six enticing appetizers, six main entrees and five choicest desserts. Free flowing bubbly and soft drinks. All for just $19.99 per person

dishes.name: Nike Air Max 90
dishes.label: Hot
dishes.description: Lace up and feel the legacy. Produced at the intersection of art, music and culture, this champion running shoe helped define the '90s. Worn by presidents, revolutionised through collabs and celebrated through rare colourways, its striking visuals, Waffle sole and exposed Nike Air cushioning keep it alive and well.

dishes.name: Nike Air Trainer 1
dishes.description: Where will you take your sneakers? Anywhere and everywhere? These essential shoes, just like the originals from '87, let you move across town without a glitch. With retro details you love like the forefoot strap and layered midsole, as well as a modern tricolour refresh, it keeps the legend alive and well.

dishes.name: Air Jodan 1 Mid
dishes.label: New
dishes.description: Inspired by the original AJ1, this mid-top edition maintains the iconic look you love while choice colours and crisp leather give it a distinct identity.

promotions.name: Men Clothes
promotions.label: New
promotions.description: If you're looking for the perfect blend of dynamic style and comfort, this men's sportswear ensemble is an irresistible choice. Crafted from flexible materials, the vibrant polo shirt and comfortable shorts not only highlight your athletic flair but also ensure you stand out in any activity. The meticulously designed shirt, adorned with an elegant brand logo, pairs seamlessly with the included sports shoes, providing both comfort and stability. Whether you're hitting the gym or simply embracing sporty fashion in your daily life, this outfit is the ideal companion.

promotions.name: Women Clothes
promotions.label: New
promotions.description: This women's sportswear ensemble is the epitome of comfort and style. The gentle pastel-colored tank top paired with stretchy leggings creates an elegant portrayal of dynamism. The breathable fabric ensures comfort throughout various activities. The fashion statement comes from the white sports shoes, highlighting a blend of femininity and modernity. You'll not only shine during your workouts but also turn heads as a fashion-forward presence on the street.

promotions.name: Kid Clothes
promotions.label: New
promotions.description: This kids' sportswear ensemble brings joy and comfort to the energetic activities of the little ones. The vibrant colored t-shirt with cute illustrations paired with stretchy shorts creates a lively picture of fun. The lightweight and breathable fabric make it easy for children to move without feeling restricted. The adorable little sports shoes serve as the perfect accent, ensuring both comfort and a cute appearance. This outfit not only boosts the children's confidence during playtime but also represents a safe and stylish choice for the future generation.

leaders.name: Peter Pan
leaders.description: Our CEO, Peter, credits his hardworking East Asian immigrant parents who undertook the arduous journey to the shores of America with the intention of giving their children the best future. His mother's wizardy in the kitchen whipping up the tastiest dishes with whatever is available inexpensively at the supermarket, was his first inspiration to create the fusion cuisines for which The Frying Pan became well known. He brings his zeal for fusion cuisines to this restaurant, pioneering cross-cultural culinary connections.

leaders.name: Dhanasekaran Witherspoon
leaders.description: Our CFO, Danny, as he is affectionately referred to by his colleagues, comes from a long established family tradition in farming and produce. His experiences growing up on a farm in the Australian outback gave him great appreciation for varieties of food sources. As he puts it in his own words, Everything that runs, wins, and everything that stays, pays!

leaders.name: Agumbe Tang
leaders.description: Blessed with the most discerning gustatory sense, Agumbe, our CFO, personally ensures that every dish that we serve meets his exacting tastes. Our chefs dread the tongue lashing that ensues if their dish does not meet his exacting standards. He lives by his motto, You click only if you survive my lick.

leaders.name: Alberto Somayya
leaders.description: Award winning three-star Michelin chef with wide International experience having worked closely with whos-who in the culinary world, he specializes in creating mouthwatering Indo-Italian fusion experiences. He says, Put together the cuisines from the two craziest cultures, and you get a winning hit! Amma Mia!
